attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anjem Choudary is a preacher of hate. He hates personal freedom and democracy. There is no place in Britain for this view. After the 7/7 bombings Choudary said they were justified. His intolerance to non Muslims is intolerable, and for the security and reputation of this country as a defender of freedom, democracy and justice, this evil man must be removed.

Visit this link to find out what sort of a man Anjem Choudary is:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YD190HVYHUI&feature=PlayList&p=24F812B3C9577261&index=8

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
